body.name: Huggies Special Delivery Hypoallergenic Diapers, Size 1, 35 Ct
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Our softest diaper ever – Our best combination of premium softness and performance to help keep your baby's skin healthy & comfortable

Outstanding leakage protection – Leak Lock system locks away moisture for up to 12 hours, and a breathable, soft-to-the-touch outer layer provides maximum breathability, plus wetness indicator changes color when wet
Hypoallergenic and made with plant-based* materials including sugar cane
No harsh ingredients – Fragrance free, paraben free, lotion free and free of elemental chlorine bleach. Dermatologist tested.
Packaging may vary from image shown
body.description: The perfect diaper – delivered! Introducing Huggies Special Delivery Baby Diapers – premium diapers that provide the best combination of softness & performance in diaper to help keep your baby’s skin protected & comfortable. Featuring over 30 adorable, exclusive designs, Huggies Special Delivery is our softest diaper ever with trusted leakage protection that lasts for up to 12 hours and let’s you know when it’s time for a change with our Huggies wetness indicator. Made with plant-based materials & sustainably harvested fluff pulp, Special Delivery disposable diapers have no harsh ingredients, are hypoallergenic, and dermatologist tested. Plus, just like all Huggies diapers, Huggies Special Delivery are paraben-free, fragrance-free and elemental chlorine-free. Huggies Special Delivery infant diapers come in sizes Newborn (up to 10 lb.), 1 (up to 14 lb.), 2 (12-18 lb.), 3 (16-28 lb.), 4 (22-37 lb.), 5 (27+ lb.), 6 (35+ lb.). And don’t forget the wipes! Start your diaper-changing routine with Huggies baby wipes. Join Huggies Rewards to earn points on all your Huggies purchases.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What makes Huggies Special Delivery the right diaper for my baby? Huggies Special Delivery are our softest diapers and offer the ultimate skin comfort for your baby. They’re plant-based*, dermatologist tested, clinically-proven hypoallergenic, and backed by our trusted leakage protection. *23% by weight Do Huggies Special Delivery diapers have fragrance? No. Huggies Special Delivery diapers do not have fragrance and are free of parabens and elemental-chlorine. Do all Huggies Special Delivery diapers have the Huggies wetness indicator? Yes. All sizes of Huggies Special Delivery include the Huggies wetness indicator that changes from yellow to blue to help show when your baby’s diaper is ready to be changed. How many prints & patterns does Huggies Special Delivery offer? We have over 25 unique prints and patterns available across all Huggies Special Delivery diapers that change based upon the size of the diaper. Be on the lookout for upcoming and new designs over time! What size do Huggies Special Delivery go up to? Huggies Special Delivery are available from size Newborn through size 6

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best diapers I have ever used!!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried every diaper on the market. These diapers are a little bit more expensive than other Huggies, but when you try them, you will understand why. They are extremely soft, super absorbent, and don't cause any type of diaper rash for our little one. We rarely have any leaks, they last all night and our little one has an 8-ounce bottle in the middle of the night. Her diaper is full in the morning but she isn't wet. Other diapers would cause a little bit of diaper rash on her skin., these don't. They fit really well around the legs and tummy. We also have these on subscribe and save. We save money by buying these on Amazon, and they are delivered right to our front door. So much easier and I have not run out of diapers yet. Once you try these diapers, you won't want to try anything else. I LOVE these diapers!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best diapers ever!!! Seriously, you won’t want any other after trying these.
reviews.reviewText: I was using Dyper bamboo diapers for my son because my conscience couldn’t take the truth about how disposable diapers take 500 years to degrade. Those were ok and simply ran too big for my infant son. We will try them again when he gets bigger but needed something ABSORBENT and that prevented poop blowouts NOW. Tried Pampers, Happy Camper, Abby and Finn, Hello Bello... all were ok but didn’t help with his blowouts or they were too big. The hospital had used Huggies Snugglers and they fit really well but I still had a guilty conscience about the waste lol. Found the Special Delivery on a google search and saw they were eco-friendly - I was souped!These diapers are amazing:1) super SOFT and cuuuuuute designs2) the poop catcher REALLY WORKS and is literally a life saver!!!!!! No other diaper has this little pocket of heaven I don’t think.Literally this little pocket has prevented sooooooo many blowouts!3) INCREDIBLY absorbent!!! Works wonders as an overnight diaper and my son wears them during the day for hours as well. I only immediately change him after he poops.4) Stays dry - my son’s skin does not sit in wetness while wearing it for hours. This diaper does a great job wicking away the moisture and keeping him free from wetness and rashesJust buy these - honestly. You won’t regret it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My FAVORITE diapers!
reviews.reviewText: These diapers are my absolute favorite. They are softer than any diaper I have felt (and I used to work at a daycare so I've felt a wide variety). They are very absorbent, and the fit is slightly larger so they last longer when you're LO is between sizes. My go-to was always Huggies Little Snugglers because they're also very soft and absorbent, but these are my #1 favorite. I also prefer Huggies brand in general because they are the only diaper brand I have tried that does not cause a diaper rash in BOTH my kids (even Pampers brand, the supposed "#1 recommended" brand, will cause a diaper rash on my babies). My oldest (now 6) couldn't wear any other brand of diaper or after 1/2 a day his butt would be red and raw. My now 3 month old is the same -- any other diaper will tear up her hind end but Huggies never does. 100% recommend these diapers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper alternative to honest brand .
reviews.reviewText: Let me start first by saying I Regularly use honest diapers. This is a good runner up if you can’t afford the honest brand . I wanted to try these out to see if they were good and I must admitting they exceeded my expectations. In my opinion they are even better than the pampers natural line . My son has super sensitive skin and something in the pampers natural diapers broke him out still. I was waiting for my honest order to arrive so I tried these and as I stated pleasantly surprised . They also worked well on his sensitive skin . The prints are cute and adorable As well . They are also softer and less starchy feeling compared to honest. The softness was something that definitely stood out for me . I’ve never used Huggies diapers because of the whole fiberglass situation but I’m glad I gave them a try when I saw them come out with this line come out . I wish they had better prints but that just something small when putting it up against leak protection , absorption, and is it sensitive skin friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best diaper for any baby.
reviews.reviewText: I only use huggies on my baby, so when I heard about these I had to try them out. Not only are they so soft but the absorbency is amazing! My daughter sleeps through the night, so i put them on her before bed (10pm) and didnt change it until we woke up the next day (10am) so I could see if the really work. The pamper was full, she peed a good amount but the inside was still dry! It was like magic. I will most definitely be using huggies special delivery exclusively now. So worth it! Although i wont be keeping my baby in a pamper for 12 hours. The cocoa butter and shea wipes are great with it too. Recommend those as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I love this for my baby! These came out when she was a size 3, but I wish they were available sooner! They’re velvety soft and pillow-like. It’s comparable to the pampers pure line, but I feel that these are softer and my baby does better with huggies. They’re stretchy, no leaks so far, soft, and can withstand crawling and walking without any messes. Honest, 7th Generation and Pampers Pure all leaked with my crawler but not these! I wish they had the extra front Velcro tabs though. Other than that, they’re perfect! Hopefully amazon adds them to the subscribe and save soon! Do your baby a favor and get these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Huggies Special Delivery for the Win!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I never have been more in love with a diaper than these Huggies Special Delivery!! I have been using so many different brands of diapers from Pampers Pure, Honest, and Cloud Island from Target, but I always find myself going right back to Huggies, especially the Special Delivery not only are the soft and super cute with the many different designs and patterns. But they are super absorbent, no leak through (especially at night !!! A++) but they are gentle on my son bottom !!! I'm really happy with my purchase and will continue to buy them !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, but too thick
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited about these! I loved Huggies, and was curious why they dont have anything like that. But I was slightly disappointed- they are so thick. As to the rest, I found nothing special. They are much softer on the outside tho. I went back using Seventh generation.
